set(NAME_MODULE LowLevelAABB)

set(MODULE_TYPE STATIC)#INLINE STATIC DYNAMIC 

set(HPP_FILES_RECURSE *.h *.hpp)
set(CPP_FILES_RECURSE *.cpp)

set(DEBUG_POSTFIX "DEBUG")
set(CHECKED_POSTFIX "CHECKED")
set(PROFILE_POSTFIX "PROFILE")
set(RELEASE_POSTFIX "")

set(PhysXRoot "${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR}/../../")
set(LowLevelDir "${PhysXRoot}/Source/LowLevel")
set(LowLevelAABBDir "${PhysXRoot}/Source/LowLevelAABB")

set(INCLUDES_PRIVATE "${LowLevelDir}/API/include"
             "${LowLevelDir}/common/include/utils"
             "${LowLevelDir}/common/include/pipeline"
             "${LowLevelDir}/common/software/include"
             "${LowLevelDir}/common/software/include/unix"
             "${LowLevelAABBDir}/include"
             "${LowLevelAABBDir}/src"
             "${LowLevelAABBDir}/unix/include")

setup_main_module()
